name: Jorge Aragão
description: '''Jorge Aragão da Cruz''' ({{IPA|pt|ˈʒɔʁʒi aɾaˈɡɐ̃w}}, born 1 March 1949 in [[Rio de Janeiro]]) is a Brazilian musician, singer-songwriter, working in the genres of [[samba]] and [[pagode]]. He is a multi-instrumentalist, and plays the [[acoustic guitar|guitar]], ''[[surdo]]'', ''[[cavaco]]'' and [[banjo (samba)|banjo]], among other instruments. In performance, he usually plays the ''[[cavaquinho]]'' most of the show, and sometimes the banjo.
